messages.message:
hi team, is anyone familiar with ibocr methods? I'm trying to create an `IBOCRRecord` that is the same as another `IBOCRRecord` , but with different refined phrases by doing
```builder = IBOCRRecordBuilder()
builder.set_from_deepcopy_of_record(original_ibocr_record)
builder.set_refined_phrases(my_new_refined_phrasese)
new_ibocr_record, err = builder.as_record()```
However, I can't figure out how to do this - it seems like I can never change ibocr metadata that is set by the `set_from_deepcopy_of_record` , no matter what code I write to clear/change the refined phrases before/after I do `set_from_deepcopy_of_record` . Does anyone know if its possible to do what I want to do?
@andy does flow review do something similar when users make corrections?
